alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:29PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Lackawanna County through 300 PM EDT... At 229 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dickson City, or near Waverly, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Dunmore, Archbald, Blakely, Dickson City, Olyphant, Clarks Summit, Jessup, Throop and Jermyn. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 186 and 199. Interstate 84 between 1 and 2, and near 4. Interstate 380 near 24. Interstate 476 near 131. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern Pennsylvania.
